common_issues.title: Issues with Pieces OS Upgrade, Authentication, and Installation
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing problems with upgrading to Pieces OS Pro, authenticating their accounts after purchase, and completing the installation process.  Upgrade attempts result in a blank checkout page. Authentication issues prevent Pro users from accessing their memberships.  Installation issues include the "Ensure core dependencies" step failing and requiring retry.  Further investigation is needed to identify the root causes and solutions for these issues across different operating systems (macOS, Windows, Linux).

related_issues.title: Unable to upgrade subscription
related_issues.text:
Unable to upgrade subscription
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Every time I click "Upgrade" from ANYWHERE - to upgrade to pro, it leads to a page that is blank except for a minimal table, like the bones of a cart checkout view, with like price, subtotal, total, etc. except there are no words, and all the values are 0.00 (zero dollars).. it stays like this for a minute, then says it isn't working properly and returns to the desktop view or the view I was in before. 

been happening for weeks

* Pieces OS Version 4.3.1





After installation, the “Initialize Desktop App” step has run successfully. The “Ensure core dependencies” step displays the message “Retry Step”.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces OS: Issues with selection, dependencies, and authentication
common_issues.description: Users report persistent selection issues, including unintended selection with arrow keys and mouse clicks, preventing copy-pasting.  Additionally, the "Ensure core dependencies" step fails during installation on Linux.  Authentication problems also arise, with users unable to access Pro features despite purchasing memberships. Troubleshooting steps include checking system settings, reinstalling the application, and verifying account status.

common_issues.title: Pieces software incompatibility issues across platforms
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing incompatibility issues with Pieces software, including the Raycast extension on macOS (v1.100.3), core dependencies on Linux (v4.3.1), and authentication problems on Windows (v12.1.1).  The Raycast extension triggers an update error, Linux setup stalls at "Ensure core dependencies," and Windows users are unable to authenticate despite having Pro memberships.  Suggested solutions include updating the Raycast extension, checking dependencies on Linux, and verifying login credentials on Windows.

related_issues.title: Raycast Extension Incompatible with Current Version of Raycast
related_issues.text:
Raycast Extension Incompatible with Current Version of Raycast


### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Raycast Extension

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

As mentioned on Discord, it appears that the Raycast needs to be updated to be compatible with (at least) the current version of Raycast 1.100.3. Trying to use any of the extension's functions triggers an error saying:

> Your Pieces Raycast Extension needs to be updated,...

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/506778e6-5b13-4811-a21c-82c42384cb41)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving the upgrade issue to ensure paying users can access Pro features.
Investigate and fix the "Ensure core dependencies" failure during installation on Linux and potentially other operating systems.
Address the persistent selection bug in the desktop application to improve user experience.
Update the Raycast extension to maintain compatibility with the latest Raycast version.
Improve communication with users awaiting responses or confirmation to reduce pending tickets.
Investigate and resolve the authentication issues across different platforms to ensure users can access their purchased memberships.
